price: ហើយមូសាក៏បានដកដៃរបស់គេ(ចេញពីហោប៉ៅ)រំពេច នោះវាក៏ក្លាយជាពន្លឺពណ៌សចែងចាំងសម្រាប់អ្នកទស្សនាទាំងអស់។
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
